Pre-Game Insights: The Faroe Islands are on a three-game losing streak and have won just one of their last 16 games across all competitions.
North Macedonia have also lost their last three games on the bounce and are winless in their last six.
The two sides faced off for the first time in a friendly clash last March which the visitors won 1-0 via a late strike from Girona striker Bojan Miovski.
The Faroe Islands have managed just two clean sheets in their last 22 games across all competitions.
North Macedonia are the stronger side ahead of Saturday's game and should come out on top here.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The hosts have lost their last four games on home soil and could struggle this weekend.
Both sides have found the back of the net in just one of the hosts' last 10 matches.
